title: My Favorite Headphones of 2019! ðŸŽ§
description: Between Bluetooth wireless and USB-C headphones are changing fast. Check out the LG Gram!  OnePlus Bullets:  Zero Audio Carbo Tenore on Amazon:  Final E4000 on Amazon:  Grado SR80e on Amazon:  Apple AirPods 2 on Amazon:  Sony 1000XM3 on Amazon:   By using our Amazon affiliate links, you help to support the channel as we may receive compensation for purchases through those links.  Watch as Austin Evans takes a look at his favorite headphones this yearand see why theyre the perfect addition to his go-to laptop of 2019: the LG gram 14-inch 2-in-1! Its not only a great laptop to listen to music on, the gram is also super lightweight, travels easy, has awesome touchscreen capabilities andits biggest selling feature? The long-lasting 72Wh battery, of course. Add to that Built-in DTS Headphone: X processing for a thrilling audio experience with 11.1 channels of audio, along with Windows 10, an 8th Gen. Intel Core i7 processor, dual channel memory/dual channel SSD slotsand its hard to go wrong with this laptop! Can the same be said for Austins choice of headphones? See what he has to say about it and be sure to learn more about the LG gram here:    Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
